song.title: Rainbow Dragon
song.info:
STIL: Comments from Ben Daglish are denoted (BD)
A slightly remixed version of a tune "which I'd written a little while before, I think, for a game demo that was sent to whatever Gremlin was called before it was Gremlin - they had a little SW house over the 'Just Micro' shop..." (BD) It was possibly meant to be a tune for the game Rainbow Dragon, later released by Firebird, and it was never used.
